PLPro directly interacts with IFN regulatory factor 3 (IRF-3) to block IRF-3 phosphorylation and nuclear translocation. PLPro suppresses the NF-B signaling pathway by preventing IB degradation. PLPro interacts with the ubiquitinated forms of STING, RIG-I, TRAF3, TBK1 and IRF-3. de-ubiquitinating enzyme cylindromatosis inhibits NF-B signaling via de-ubiquitination and inactivation of TNFR-associated factor 2 (TRAF2) and TRAF6. de-ubiquitinating protease A20 inhibits NF-B activation induced by toll- analysis of ubiquitin-modified proteins reveals change in ubiquitination of TRAF3 and TRFA6 played crucial role in antagonistic mechanisms of TLR7-mediated type I IFN induction and NF-B activation by PLPro. results 2.1. PLPro-expressing and vector control cells were transfected with the indicated cis-reporter plasmid. the activity of experimental firefly luciferase and control Renilla luciferase was measured. amplification and detection of specific products were performed in an ABI Prism 7900 sequence detection system (PE Applied Biosystems, Carlsbad, CA, USA) real-time PCR was performed as described in previous reports [23,24]. immunoprecipitated proteins were dissolved in 2 SDS-PAGE sample buffers without 2-mercaptoethanol, boiled for 10 min, separated by SDS-PAGE. blots were blocked with skim milk, reacted with specific monoclonal antibodies anti-TRAF3, anti-TRAF6, anti-Lys48- or anti-Lys63-linked ubiquitin. blots were probed with specific primary antibodies against IRF3, phosphor-IRF3, STAT1, phospho-STAT1(Tyr701), NF-B p65, phospho-NF-B p65, p38 MAPK, c-Jun, phospho-c-Jun, TBK1, phospho-TBK1, TRAF3, TRAF6 and anti-actin mAb. cDNA was synthesized from 1 g total RNA, using oligonucleotide d(T) primer and a superscript III reverse transcriptase kit. each real-time PCR reaction contained 5 L of a cDNA mixture. real-time PCR was performed in an ABI Prism 7900 sequence detection system (PE Applied Biosystems, Carlsbad, CA, USA) amplification and detection of specific products were performed as described in previous reports [23,24]. nal antibodies anti-TRAF3, anti-TRAF6, anti-Lys48- or anti-Lys63-linked ubiquitin followed by enhanced chemiluminescence detection.
